intro: Zosterophyllanthos erythrium, commonly known as the red flame plant, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions. It belongs to the family Zosterophyllanthaceae and is characterized by its vibrant red flowers. The plant has lance-shaped leaves that are typically arranged in a spiral pattern along the stem. It thrives in well-drained soil and requires full sunlight to flourish. Zosterophyllanthos erythrium is often cultivated for its ornamental value due to its striking color and unique foliage.
